evaṃ vyupaparīkṣamāṇaś citte sūpasthitasmṛtir viharati, na ca cittasya vaśaṃ gacchati. api tu cittam evāsya vaśaṃ gacchati. cittenāsya vaśībhūtena sarve dharmā vaśībhavantīti.

syād etat—dānapāramitādiṣu katham iva cittaṃ pradhānam? sā hi sarvasattvānāṃ dāridryāpanayanalakṣaṇety āha.

dāridryaṃ hi nāma sāsravasukhabhogabubhukṣayā cittakārpaṇyam upakaraṇavaikalyaṃ vā. tad apanīya jagato yadi dānapāramitāparipūrir bhavatīty ucyate, tadā sā katham? na kathaṃcid api pūrvatāyināṃ pūrvam abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yujyate. kutaḥ? jagaddaridram adyāpi, nādyāpi yāvaj jagaddāridyam upaśāmyati.

pāramitābhyāse 'narthavivarjanāyānupūrvakāritām āha.

uparyuparito dānāc chīlaṃ śreṣṭham, śīlāt kṣāntir ityādayaḥ. ato 'varapāramitāhetor uttaraṃ na tyajet. tadvirodhena na seveteti bhāvaḥ. kiṃ sarvathā? nety āha—anyatreti. bodhiattvānāṃ ya ācāraḥ śikṣāsaṃvaralakṣaṇaḥ sa eva kuśalajalarakṣaṇāya setubandho vihitaḥ, tasmād anyatra taṃ vihāya. sa yathā na bhidyate ity arthaḥ.

tasmāt saṃbhāram upāditsunā karuṇāparatantreṇa sarvaṃ karaṇīyam uktam ity āha. evam anuttaraṃ jñātvā sattvānāṃ hitasukhavidhānāya nityam ārabdhavīryo bhavet. pratiṣiddhārthe pravṛttau kathaṃ na sāpattika iti cet, na. kvacin niṣiddham api sattvārthaviśeṣaṃ prajñācakṣuṣā paśyataḥ karaṇīyatayānujñātaṃ bhagavatā. saniḥsaraṇaṃ ca bhagavataḥ śāsanam.

cittād eva bhavantīti kathitaṃ tattvavādinā || 5.6 ||

yadi baddhaḥ kathaṃcid bhavet. smṛtir vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇā. saiva rajjur bandhanopāyatvāt. samantataḥ sarvathā, asatpakṣe pracāranirodhāt. tadā bhayam astaṃgataṃ pratyastamitaṃ sarvam aśeṣam. sarvaṃ kalyāṇam abhyudayaniḥśreyasalakṣaṇam. āgataṃ saṃprāptam. devaś ced vṛṣṭo niṣpannāḥ śālaya iti yathā.

kutaḥ punar evam ity āha.

sarve hy ete karmākṣepavaśād aniṣṭadāyakā bhavanti. karma ca cittam eva, cetanā karmeti vacanāt. vākkāyakarmaṇor api cittam eva samutthāpakam. tadantareṇa tayor anutpatteḥ, cetayitvā karmeti vacanāt. tasmāt sarvam iha karmanirmitam eva. tac ca cittān nānyat. tad āha-

	karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat |
	cetanā mānasaṃ karma tajje vākkāyakarmaṇī || iti || (Abhidharmakośa 4.1)

na ca anapakāracittasya kecid apakāriṇo nāma. yasmāt-

	nivṛttapāpacittasya nāsti loke bhayaṃ dviṣaḥ |
	sukhahānir na tasyāsti yasya cittaṃ vaśe sthitam ||

ata idam uktam-

	cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham | (Dhammapada 25)

iti. 

tattvavādī bhagavān, vastutattvakathanaśīlatvāt. tenedaṃ tattvaṃ kathitaṃ prakāśitam—sarvaṃ cittaprasūtam iti. ataḥ sarvatra cittam eva pradhānam.

yadātmotkarṣaṇābhāsaṃ parapaṃsanam eva ca |
sādhikṣepaṃ sasaṃrambhaṃ sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadā || 5.50 ||
passage:
tattvaṃ hy upādeyatve 'pi sukhaduḥkhopekṣādisakalapratibhāsasaṃdohavyāpakam. sādhyaṃ cānabhimataparihāreṇecchālakṣaṇaṃ phalam upādeyatve 'pi sakalaprāṇibhir avaśyam evāsādhyavyāvṛttyā sādhayitavyatvenābhimatam ity adoṣaḥ. tatra tāvad vedāntavādyabhimataṃ sādhyam āha—ānandarūpam ityādi.

ānandarūpam iti sadā sukhamayatvāt. svavid iti jyotīrūpatvena svayaṃ prakāśamānatvāt. aprakampyam ity anityatayā kampayitum aśakyatvāt. śāntam iti kleśopakleśaśūnyatvena parikalpitatvāt. evaṃvidhaṃ sādhyam uṣanti kāmayante.

saha śrāvakair vartante ye khaḍgajināḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpā ekacāriṇo vargacāriṇaś ca pratyekabuddhās te sādhyam icchanti. kīdṛśam? rūpādyupadher virāmaṃ rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānalakṣaṇānām upadhīnāṃ skandhānāṃ virāmaṃ vicchedam, nirodham iti yāvat. etad uktaṃ bhavati—sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāḥ sopadhiśeṣanirupadhiśeṣabhedena bhinne 'pi nirvāṇe nirupadhiśeṣam eva nirvāṇaṃ sākṣātkartavyatve-na sādhyaṃ pratipannāḥ.

idānīṃ pāramitānayavādinām abhimataṃ caturvidhaṃ sādhyam āha—ākāraśūnyam ityādi.

brahmā viṣṇuḥ śivaḥ sarvo vibuddhas tattvam ucyate || 12 ||

tanaiva samyagjñānena sabījasaṃkleśakṣayāt pratiṣṭhādehabhoganirbhāsānāṃ ca vijñaptīnāṃ prahāṇād anāsravo dharmadhātur aprapañcaḥ. trayam idaṃ viśuddhākāśanibham anantam aprapañcam dharmakāyam ity arthaḥ. tad eva svabhāvaḥ tena svabhāvena sākṣātkarttavyāv iti bhāvaḥ.

tathā hi sa eva vairocanaḥ, prakāśamātratayā prakhyānāt. sa eva akṣobhyaḥ, nirābhāsatvāt. sa eva amoghaḥ, viśvārthakaraṇāt. sa eva ratnaḥ, sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhāt. sa eva ārolikaḥ, teṣām ātmani samyak paricchedāt. evaṃ pañcajñānamayatvāt sa eva sāttvikaḥ, vajrasattva ity arthaḥ. brahmetyādi. sa eva brahmādir ucyate.

katham ity āha—brahmetyādi. yata eva suviśuddhabodharūpatvād asau buddhas tad eva paraṃ brahma. tasmāt sa eva brahmā. nirvṛttita iti mokṣarūpatvād ity arthaḥ.

root:
vajragarbhe tadagre vā patitaṃ vā kapālake |
na ceṣṭam antarāle 'pi tattvaṃ vittau guror mukhāt || SeNi 22 ||
passage:
kutaḥ | āha—vajretyādi | neṣṭaṃ yataḥ | aniṣṭir eva kutaḥ | āha—vajragarbhe tadagre ca sātarūpākṣobhyāstitvena vajrasattvamudrāviyogāt | antarāle kapāle ca, āstāṃ tāvad vajrasattvamudrāviyogo 'dhyavasitasātasaṃvedanabhāvād grāhyādibhāvenākṣobhyamudrāyā api viyogāt | etac ca pūrvoktavajrasattvamudrāviyogata ity anuvṛtter labhyate |

tarhi tattvaṃ kutra jñeyam | tattvaṃ vittau guror mukhād iti | anena ṣoḍaśārdhārdhabindudhṛgbhagavato yatrāvasthānaṃ tad āmnāyate | tad āhuḥ—

	beṇṇi vi galle beṇṇi vi tulle |
	vājja paḍante paṃmu acchüante ||
	vājja paḍantā akhobbhaḍā paṃmu acchüantā vājja |
	kājje kāraṇa muddïa ehu so mahāsuharājja || 

etayor vajrarūpasattvarūpayor vajrasattvaśūnyatākaruṇāprajñopāyanirvāṇabhavādivyapadeśo boddhavyaḥ | ayam eva cārtha utpattikrame mahārāgād drutāpattau candrārkamadhyasthabindudvayarūpeṇordhvādhovartinā tatra tatra bhagavatā darśitaḥ | utpannas tu yathoktaḥ sekārthaḥ | pariniṣpannas tu dravād bolarūpasūryasthaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ śūnyatākaruṇārūpo dharmadhātusvabhāva utthito bhagavān | ekapādāṅguṣṭhāsanalagnatā tu skhaladavasthākālākalitatāṃ sūcayitum ||

nanv evam—

	vajravaraṭakamadhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvaṃ vibhāvayet punaḥ ||

iti katham | atra hi vajravaraṭakasya madhyastham ity asyārthasya vighaṭanāt | na | anyārthatvād asya | tathā hi vajravaraṭakayoḥ prajñopāyavarāṅgayor madhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvam iti ha iti hetuśūnyam u ity ūhāpagatam aṃ ity apratiṣṭhitaṃ bhāvayed iti vivakṣitatvāt |

tarhi maṇer antargatam iti katham | ucyate | atrāpy anya evārthaḥ | tathā hi maṇyoḥ paṅkajakuliśayor antargatam itīdam api sustham | 

nanv etat katham avagamyate yad ubhayatrāyam artho vivakṣita iti | ucyate—

	kamalākāśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pīḍanasthāne |
	vajraparyaṅkataś cittaṃ maṇyantargatam īkṣayan |
	yat tad utpadyate jñānaṃ jñānaṃ tadrūpam ity alam ||

iti paramādye pravacanāt | atrāyam arthaḥ | kamalasyākāśe kamalamadhyaśūnyadeśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pañkajakuliśayoḥ pīḍanasthāne saṅghaṭṭanasthāne | vajraparyaṅkata iti vajrasya pari sarvato 'ṅkataḥ kroḍata iti pañcamyā vajrād bahir lagnamātraṃ vivakṣitam | cittaṃ maṇyor antargatam īkṣamāṇasya yad vijñānam utpadyate tad vijñānasvarūpam ity arthaḥ | tathā ca vajāmṛte—

	nābhimadhye sthitaṃ devi karṇikāgūḍhagocare |
	sravate śukrarūpeṇa bhagaliṅgāntare sthitam ||

iti | uktaṃ ca hevajre—

	candrāli kālimārtaṇḍa bījaṃ madhyagataṃ bhavet |

iti | tathā ca |

	yāvan no patati prabhāsvaramayaḥ śītāṃśudhārādravo 
		devīpadmadalodare samarasībhūto jinānāṃ gaṇaiḥ |
	sphūrjadvajraśikhāgrataḥ karuṇayābhinnaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ 
		tāvac chrīkaruṇābalasya sahajaṃ jānīhi rūpaṃ vibhoḥ || (1)

	yāvad vajramaṇes trivajradahane bhraśyan vidhur vāyunā 
		tiṣṭhaty abjapuṭe sukoṭarakuṭīlīnecchur asmin kṣaṇe |
	yad bhūtaṃ svaparādikalparahitaṃ vyāpārahīnaṃ mano
		jānīmaḥ sahajaṃ tad eva hi punar yuktyāgamena sphuṭam | (2) 

	prajñāpaṅkajavajrayogaparamānandāvaśeṣe sthite
		sthānasrāvaviśuddhabindur acalo yāvan mṛgāṅko mataḥ |
	tāvac cittam acañcalaṃ calamarutsrotaś ca vidhvaṃsyate 
		na śrotraṃ śṛṇute 'kṣi neṅgati mahāmudreti sā ceṣyate || (3) 

tarhi—

	nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ na kasminn api labhyate |
	ātmanā jñāyate puṇyād guruparvopasevayā ||

ity uktaṃ katham | atra guruparva vajraparva | sevākāla ity arthasaṅgatyabhāvād upasevābhāvāt | na | upaśabdena sāmīpyavācakatvena vajrād bahiḥ samīpe sevety uktam | 

tarhi—

	bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā vajrāyatanam upāyakam |

iti katham | atrāpi yad bolasaukhyaṃ sā mahāmudrā | vajram eva āyatanaṃ sthānam upāyakam ity arthāsaṅgateḥ | na | bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā ca vajrāyatanasthaṃ yat sa paramānandaḥ | tad upāyakam iti darśitam | kiṃ cāsmanmate—

	athāto rahasyaṃ vakṣye samāsān na tu vistarāt |
	rahasye parame 

ityādi sustham | tathā hi rahasye rahasyaṃ vakṣya iti sambandhaḥ | rahasya iti rahau vajraṃ padmamṃ ca tayor antarāle | seti sarvākāreṇa | yeti yathātathyam | ety advayam | ītīdantātītam | 

tathā coktam—

	repho vajram iti prokto hakāraḥ padmam ucyate |

iti ||

atha tattvapaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |

passage:
uktau dvau devatāyogau samāhitaḥ sandhyāsu, asamāhitaḥ sandhyāntarāleṣu. tattvayogo vaktavyaḥ, yatas tribhir vinā nāsti śīghrataraṃ bodhiḥ. ata āha—tattvetyādi. tattvasya dyotakaḥ paṭalas tattvapaṭalaḥ.

rūpaṃ nīlapītādi. tan nāsti na vidyate. kathaṃ nāsti? svarūpeana—yad asya svarūpaṃ bālaiḥ kalpyate darśanagrāhyaṃ vastubhūtam, tena nāsti, ekānekasvabhāvavirahāt. kevalaṃ bhrāntā buddhir bālānām asataiva tena tenākāreṇa khyāti svapnādāv iva. rūpābhāve na kaścid rūpaṃ paśyatīti draṣṭā 'pi nāsti. tenāha—na draṣṭā ceti. na draṣṭety arthaḥ. draṣṭā cakṣurdhātur draṣṭā puruṣo dvāv api svarūpeṇa na staḥ. yad anayoḥ svarūpaṃ vastugrāhakaṃ bālair vikalpyate tena na staḥ. evaṃ yāvan na sparśo nāpi spraṣṭā ca. iyatā daśāyatanāni rūpacakṣurādīni. draṣṭādirūpaś ca pudgalo nāstīty uktam.

na cittam iti vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ cittam. vijānātīti vijñānaṃ ṣaḍvijñānakāyāś cakṣurvijñānadhātur yāvan manovijñānadhātuḥ. etāny eva samanantarātītāni manodhātuḥ. saptaite vijñānadhātavo manaāyatanam. yaś ca ṣaḍbhir vijñānair vijñātā pudgalaḥ, so 'pi vijānātīti vijñānam. tataḥ so 'pi cittaśabdenoktaḥ. tad ubhayaṃ nāsti, tayor grāhakalakṣaṇatvāt, grāhyābhāve ca grāhakāyogāt.

kasmād grāhyaṃ nāsti? ekānekasvabhāvavirahāt. siddha eṣa hetuḥ sāvayaveṣu daśasvāyataneṣu niraṃśeṣu ca paramāṇuṣu. paramāṇumātre 'pi sthūlapratibhāsāyogāt.

dharmāyatane tu yāni dravyāṇi teṣu niraṃśeṣu pratibhāsamānarūpasyotpatter asiddho hetuḥ, tasmān na dharmāyatanaṃ nāstīty ata āha—na caittikam iti. cittasya viṣayaś caittikaṃ dharmāyatanam, tad api nāsti. akṣaṇikānām anyatra nirākṛtatvāt, kṣaṇikānām api grāhyatvāyogāt, atītānāgatānām asattvena vartamānānām akāraṇatvenāgrāhyalakṣaṇatvāc ca viṣayasya. yadi tarhi dvayarūpeṇa na santi, dvādaśāyatanāni pudgalaś ca kena rūpeṇa santi? dvayapratibhāsinā bhrāntirūpeṇa dravyataḥ santi, tena pratītyasamutpannatvāt. yat punar eṣāṃ rūpaṃ dvayaśūnyatā vijñaptimātratā prakāśamātratā sarvatra samarasā, tenaite paramārthataḥ santi. tad dhi paramārthaḥ paramasya lokottarajñānasyārtho viṣayaḥ. tatra dvayasaṃgṛhītaṃ rūpaṃ nāstīti parijñeyam, tadastitvābhiniveśasyaiva sarvānarthamūlatvāt. dvayapratibhāsi bhrāntirūpaṃ prahātavyam, bhrāntiprabhedatvāt sarvānarthānām. dvayaśūnyatārūpaṃ punar eṣāṃ pratyakṣīkartavyam, tatpratyakṣasyaiva samyagjñānarūpatvāt, tasya ca sarvabhrāntipratipakṣatvāt, krameṇa mahāsukhamahāmokṣasakalabuddhaguṇavaśitvasādhanatvāc ca. so 'pi mahāmokṣaḥ paramārthaḥ paramaphalatvāt tad api samyagjñānaṃ paramārthaḥ paramo 'rtho 'syeti kṛtvā. iyatā tathatātattvam uktam.

narakapālānāṃ kuntāsimusalādīni, asipatravanasamudbhūtāni vā kena kṛtāni? na tatra kaścit kartāstīśvarādiḥ, tatkartṛtvasya anyatra niṣiddhatvāt, ihāpi niṣetsyamānatvāt. taptalohamayī ca bhūmiḥ kena ghaṭitā? tāś ca striyaḥ kutaḥ kāraṇasāmagrīto jātāḥ, yāḥ pāradārikaiḥ śālmalīvṛkṣasyādhastād upari ca dṛśyante? sa ca śālmalir vā? ato nānyat kāraṇam atra cittād upakalpanīyam. yad uktam—

	sattvalokam atha bhājanalokaṃ cittam eva racayaty aticitram |
	karmajaṃ hi jagaduktam aśeṣaṃ karma cittam avadhūya ca nāsti || (Madhyamakāvatāra 6.89)

iti.

	samantabhadrajñānasya svayam evāvabhotsyate |

iti || atas tasya svayaṃbhuva iti suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānadvāreṇa || kim uktaṃ bhavati | pañcajñānātmako bhagavān mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ | mañjuḥ komalā śrīr yasyāsau mañjuśrīḥ | jñānasattva iti | sarvatathāgatahṛdayavihāritvāt | mañjuśrīś cāsau jñānasattvaś ceti mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ | nāyaṃ daśabhūmīśvaro bodhisattvaḥ kiṃ tarhy advayajñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā saiva mañjuśrījñānasattvaḥ || ata evāha dignāgapādaḥ |

	caturbhir maitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavati. katamaiś caturbhiḥ? yad uta vidūṣaṇāsamudācāreṇa, pratipakṣasamudācāreṇa, pratyāpattibalena, āśrayabalena ca. tatra vidūṣaṇāsamudācāro 'kuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā vipratisārarūpāt savigarhaṇā pāpadeśanā, tadanuṣṭhānaṃ tatsamudācāraḥ. tatra pratipakṣasamudācāro 'kuśalapratipakṣaḥ kuśalam, tatsamudācāraḥ, kṛtvāpy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale karmaṇy atyantam abhiyogaḥ. tatra pratyāpattibalaṃ saṃvarasamādānād akaraṇasaṃvaralābhaḥ | tatrāśrayabalaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghaśaraṇagamanam, anutsṛṣṭabodhicittatā ca. sa balavatsaṃniśrayeṇa na śakyate pāpenābhibhavitum. ebhir maitreya caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavat.

iit. viśeṣatas tu bodhisattvāpattīnāṃ gurvīṇāṃ laghvīnāṃ ca deśanā āryopāliparipṛcchāyām uktāḥ. tāḥ śikṣāsamuccaye draṣṭavyāḥ.

sarvāpattayo bodhisattvena pañcatriṃśatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike rātriṃdivam ekākinā deśayitavyāḥ. tatreyaṃ deśanā—aham evaṃnāmā buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmīty ārabhya yāvat saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi, namaḥ śākyamunaye tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya. namo vajrapramardine ityārabhya yāvat.

upaimi sarvān śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ.

iti vistaram uktvāha-iti hi śāriputra bodhisattvena imān pañcatriṃśato buddhān pramukhān kṛtvā sarvatathāgatānugatair manasikāraiḥ pāpaviśuddhiḥ kāryā. tasyaivaṃ pāpaviśuddhasya ta eva buddhā bhagavanto mukhāny upadarśayanti. peyālam. na tat śakyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhanikāyair āpattikaukṛtyasthānaṃ viśodhayituṃ yad bodhisattvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyadhāraṇaparikīrtanena rātriṃdivaṃ triskandhakadharmaparyāyapravartanena āpattikaukṛtyān niḥsarati, samādhiṃ ca pratilabhate. etat sākalyena śikṣāsamuccaye veditavyam.

ukto vidūṣaṇāsamudācāraḥ. pratipakṣasamudācārapratyāpattibale 'pi vistareṇa śikṣāsamuccayād eva draṣṭavye. āryamaitreyavimokṣe tu bodhicittena pāpaviśuddhir uktā. taccoktam eva prāk. jināśrayāt pāpaviśuddhau sūkarikāvadānam udāhāryam.

evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ cādhikṛtya pāṭhaḥ. anenāśrayabalamuktam.

passage:
dambholītyādi. etat sadgurūpadeśato jñeyam.

pañcapradīpetyādi. pañcapradīpaśabdena gokudahanalakṣaṇasya, amṛtaśabdena vimūmāraśulakṣaṇasya satatānuṣṭhānam eva sādhyaṃ manyante. bindur iti hṛccandrasthaṃ binduṃ dedīpyamānaṃ tattvaṃ sādhyaṃ ceti kṛtvā kecid bhāvayanti. candra iti hṛdisthaṃ kalārūpam ardhacandraṃ vā hṛtkamalasthaṃ kecid bhāvayanti.

bhrūmadhyabindūdbhavamaṇḍalānīti bhruvor madhya ūrṇāyāṃ binduṃ vibhāvya tadbindūdbhavāni maṇḍalāni vāyuvāruṇamāhendrāgneyalakṣaṇāni. etad uktaṃ bhavati—mukhaśravaṇacakṣurghrāṇāni hastāṅgulībhiḥ pidhāya bhrūmadhyabindur draṣṭavyaḥ. tasya sphuṭāvasthāyāṃ śubhāśubhanimittasaṃsūcakāni māhendrādimaṇḍalāny upajāyante. taṃ ca binduṃ tattvam iti manyante.

vāyoḥ svarūpam iti pūrakakumbhakarecakapraśāntakalakṣaṇam ānāpānādilakṣaṇaṃ ceti. etad uktaṃ bhavati—śaivasāṃkhyādinirdiṣṭaṃ vāyusvarūpaṃ jñātvā taṃ vāyuṃ nirodhabhāvanayā sthirīkṛtyākāśa utplutya gamanaṃ parapurapraveśaṃ yāvan muktiṃ ca sākṣāt kurvanti vāyuvādinaḥ.

galaśuṇḍiketi. galapradeśe jihvāmūlopari hastiśuṇḍikākārā adhaḥpralambamānā upajihvāsaṃjñikā galaśuṇḍikāsti. sā ca śaktirūpā. tadadhaḥ śivarūpam asti tattvam. sā ca jihvāgreṇa spṛśyamānā nirantaraṃ amṛtaṃ sravati. tena ca ghargharāmṛtavarṣaṇena santarpyamānam ātmānaṃ dhyāyād iti galaśuṇḍikātattvam. ādiśabdena hṛnmadhyaṣoḍaśanāḍikācakramadhyasthajñānasvarūpaṃ śivarūpaṃ tattvaṃ bhāvayitavyam ityādīnāṃ parigrahaḥ.

tat sarvaṃ tīrthikādibhis tattvarūpeṇābhimatam atattvam iti svayam evohanīyaṃ vicāraṇīyam iti yāvat.

svapnendrajāletyādi. svapnendrajālopamaṃ pratibimbamāyāmarīcigandharvanagarodakacandropamam iti śabdaiḥ, anyaiś ca gaganapratiśrutkaphenopamam ityādiśabdair upamābhidheyair upamāvācakair naivāsti sādhyaṃ kathitāt sādhyād anyat. paraṃ kathita eva sādhya ete śabdāḥ pravartanta iti svayaṃ boddhavyam.

	kamalākāśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pīḍanasthāne |
	vajraparyaṅkataś cittaṃ maṇyantargatam īkṣayan |
	yat tad utpadyate jñānaṃ jñānaṃ tadrūpam ity alam ||

iti paramādye pravacanāt | atrāyam arthaḥ | kamalasyākāśe kamalamadhyaśūnyadeśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pañkajakuliśayoḥ pīḍanasthāne saṅghaṭṭanasthāne | vajraparyaṅkata iti vajrasya pari sarvato 'ṅkataḥ kroḍata iti pañcamyā vajrād bahir lagnamātraṃ vivakṣitam | cittaṃ maṇyor antargatam īkṣamāṇasya yad vijñānam utpadyate tad vijñānasvarūpam ity arthaḥ | tathā ca vajāmṛte—

	nābhimadhye sthitaṃ devi karṇikāgūḍhagocare |
	sravate śukrarūpeṇa bhagaliṅgāntare sthitam ||

iti | uktaṃ ca hevajre—

	candrāli kālimārtaṇḍa bījaṃ madhyagataṃ bhavet |

iti | tathā ca |

	yāvan no patati prabhāsvaramayaḥ śītāṃśudhārādravo 
		devīpadmadalodare samarasībhūto jinānāṃ gaṇaiḥ |
	sphūrjadvajraśikhāgrataḥ karuṇayābhinnaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ 
		tāvac chrīkaruṇābalasya sahajaṃ jānīhi rūpaṃ vibhoḥ || (1)

	yāvad vajramaṇes trivajradahane bhraśyan vidhur vāyunā 
		tiṣṭhaty abjapuṭe sukoṭarakuṭīlīnecchur asmin kṣaṇe |
	yad bhūtaṃ svaparādikalparahitaṃ vyāpārahīnaṃ mano
		jānīmaḥ sahajaṃ tad eva hi punar yuktyāgamena sphuṭam | (2) 

	prajñāpaṅkajavajrayogaparamānandāvaśeṣe sthite
		sthānasrāvaviśuddhabindur acalo yāvan mṛgāṅko mataḥ |
	tāvac cittam acañcalaṃ calamarutsrotaś ca vidhvaṃsyate 
		na śrotraṃ śṛṇute 'kṣi neṅgati mahāmudreti sā ceṣyate || (3) 

tarhi—

	nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ na kasminn api labhyate |
	ātmanā jñāyate puṇyād guruparvopasevayā ||

ity uktaṃ katham | atra guruparva vajraparva | sevākāla ity arthasaṅgatyabhāvād upasevābhāvāt | na | upaśabdena sāmīpyavācakatvena vajrād bahiḥ samīpe sevety uktam | 

tarhi—

	bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā vajrāyatanam upāyakam |

iti katham | atrāpi yad bolasaukhyaṃ sā mahāmudrā | vajram eva āyatanaṃ sthānam upāyakam ity arthāsaṅgateḥ | na | bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā ca vajrāyatanasthaṃ yat sa paramānandaḥ | tad upāyakam iti darśitam | kiṃ cāsmanmate—

	athāto rahasyaṃ vakṣye samāsān na tu vistarāt |
	rahasye parame 

ityādi sustham | tathā hi rahasye rahasyaṃ vakṣya iti sambandhaḥ | rahasya iti rahau vajraṃ padmamṃ ca tayor antarāle | seti sarvākāreṇa | yeti yathātathyam | ety advayam | ītīdantātītam | 

tathā coktam—

	repho vajram iti prokto hakāraḥ padmam ucyate |

iti ||

mahāsamayatattvajña idriyāśayavit paraḥ || 9 ||
passage:
prakāśayatu bhagavān ity āha | saṃbuddha iti śāśvatadvāreṇa || jagadanuśāsanāc chāstety akṣobhyadvāreṇa || jagatāṃ gurur jagadgurur iti ratnasaṃbhavadvāreṇa || samayo bhagavān śrīvajrasattvaḥ | mahāś cāsau samayaś ca mahāsamayaḥ | tasya tattvaṃ mahāsamayatattvaṃ | taj jānātīti mahāsamayatattvajña iti | amitābhadvāreṇa || indriyāṇi mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇi | teṣām āśayo 'bhiprāyaḥ | taṃ vettīti indriyāśayavid ity amoghasiddhidvāreṇa || evaṃ pañcatathāgatāmako bhagavān para utkṛṣṭaḥ prakāśayatv ity arthaḥ ||

sarvam ākāśasaṃkāśaṃ kṣaṇamātraṃ vibhāvya ca |
śuddhasphaṭikavat svaccham ātmadehaṃ vibhāvayet || 4.10 ||
passage:
ākāśasaṃkāśam iti ākāśaṃ pratighadravyābhāvamātram | tena saṃkāśaṃ sadṛśaṃ niśceṣṭībhūya nirālambarūpeṇa katipayakṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭhed ity arthaḥ | tatas tadanantarajhaṭity ātmānaṃ māṃsāsthirudhirādivarjitaṃ śubharaśmipuṅgam iva karacaraṇād yupetaṃ khaḍgapāśādirahitaṃ sattvaparyaṅkiṇaṃ jaṭāmukuṭadharaṃ samādhimudrārpitapāṇipadmam | athavā svabhāvaprajñāṅgasaṅginaṃ śvetapadmacandramaṇḍalāsanam antarīkṣasthitam anantākāśamaṇḍale bhāvayet ||

tato 'grataḥ saptapātāladeśagatadṛṣṭiḥ sann ityarthaḥ | vātetyādi tad anantākāśāntargataṃ nīlayaṃkārapariṇataṃ vāyumaṇḍalaṃ ṣoḍaśalakṣayojanapramāṇam utsargeṇa tiryagsaṃkhyapramāṇaṃ cākāraṃ koṭidvaye ca latāpatākāṅkitaṃ śyāmavarṇaṃ bhāvayet | tadupari raktaraṃkārapariṇatam agnimaṇḍalaṃ trikoṇaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalapramāṇaṃ raktavarṇaṃ koṇeṣu raṃkārāṅkitaṃ bhāvayet |
